prepareInstallation.description: The information required for the installation.

components.name: minVetoRatio
components.description: The minimum ratio of the token supply to veto a proposal. Its value has to be in the interval [0, 10^6] defined by `RATIO_BASE = 10**6`.

components.name: minDuration
components.description: The minimum duration of the proposal vote in seconds.

components.name: minProposerVotingPower
components.description: The minimum voting power required to create a proposal.

inputs.name: governanceSettings
inputs.description: The governance settings that will be enforced when proposals are created.

components.name: token
components.description: The token address. If this is `address(0)`, a new `GovernanceERC20` token is deployed. If not, the existing token is wrapped as an `GovernanceWrappedERC20`.

inputs.name: tokenSettings
inputs.description: The token settings that either specify an existing ERC-20 token (`token = address(0)`) or the name and symbol of a new `GovernanceERC20` token to be created.

prepareUninstallation.description: No input is required for the uninstallation.
